name: Rebellimon
effect: [When Digivolving] You may trash 1 card in your hand to have this Digimon gain ＜Blocker＞ (When an opponent's Digimon attacks, you may suspend this Digimon to force the opponent to attack it instead) and ＜Retaliation＞ (When this Digimon is deleted after losing a battle, delete the Digimon it was battling) until the end of your opponent's next turn.[All Turns] This Digimon is also treated as black.
